long_description: A backup battery for cycling with your iPhone 4/4S, 5 or iPad, the Topeak PanoBike Mobile PowerPack extends the time you can use power-hungry cycling apps. Rechargable lithium-ion battery offers enough power to recharge an iPhone 3 times, and it features a handy 4-LED power indicator that displays remaining capacity. Mounts to underside of handlebar stem and includes a 30 pin connector for iPhone or iPad and a micro USB cable to charge the Mobile PowerPack from your computer. The Topeak PanoBike Mobile PowerPack weighs approximatley 158g.
short_description: A backup battery for cycling with your iPhone 4/4S, 5 or iPad, the Topeak PanoBike Mobile PowerPack extends the time you can use power-hungry cycling apps.
